Text:
subtitles for this movie is uploaded  to divxsubtitles (dot) net , get it to translate 
to your own language

Exellent work! Have been thinking about adding norwegian subtitles to good documentaries like, Freedom to Fascism, but don't have the time and knowhow..
Just a few comments:
>Intro about what's going on in Norway is very good but details and tekst may be moving a bit fast.
Leonard Cohens "everybody knows" is cool enough, but quite some younger people may skip the intro because of the choosen soundtrack.  
>Downloadspeed is good but torrent stopped at 99.7%-4.23 Gb., and the file did not move to the share-windo. I had to copy all the VIDEO_TS files and move them to another folder in order to be able to burn.
>Freedom to Fascism is compressed. Quality is viewable for sure but my standalone DVD player had some trouble and jumped over some parts a few times when watching the movie on TV.

I would have "fixed" the above myself if I had the knowhow and time. I'm in doubt if it's worth to burn/share copies or tell others to download it as it is now.

No offense, efford is appericiated  a lot!
